short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspect elements and get their attributes and styles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Design Validator, this is developed based on rules, if you apply your rules then it will go through the current page and highlight the element which fails to follow the given rule.

It is built to validate the Design System checks in faster way.
